name: mdadm Monitor
description: Ensures mdadm monitor service is running.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl is-active mdmonitor || systemctl is-active mdadm || echo skip; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart mdmonitor || systemctl restart mdadm || true; fi
